name: Silhouette Studio Document
summary: A STUDIO file is a design project created by Silhouette Studio, a program used to design items that can be cut with a Silhouette electronic cutting machine. It contains a design, which may include shapes, images, text, lines, colors, gradients, patterns, and effects. STUDIO files also store design page settings, cut settings, and registration marks.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
